title: Acoustic Leak Detection Analysis
description: The system analyzes data from acoustic sensors in a District Metered Area (DMA) to pinpoint a non-surfacing water leak.

tasks.description: Analyze overnight minimum flow data for the DMA, identifying higher-than-normal flow.
tasks.expected_outcome: System flags the DMA for potential leakage.

tasks.description: Collect and correlate noise data from acoustic sensors within the flagged DMA.
tasks.expected_outcome: System gathers acoustic data from all relevant sensors.

tasks.description: Triangulate the source of the leak noise to a specific point between two sensors.
tasks.expected_outcome: System provides GPS coordinates for the suspected leak location.

tasks.description: Create a work order for a crew to investigate and repair the identified leak.
tasks.expected_outcome: System dispatches a crew to the precise location.
